definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: The culture supernatant of tumor cell lines was not cytoxic.
sentences.chinese: 白血病細胞培養上清液無細胞毒作用。

sentences.english: Its cytotoxic activity can be neutralized by monoclone antibody against hLT.
sentences.chinese: 抗人淋巴毒素的單克隆抗體能中和它的細胞毒活性。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION SC with cytotoxic chemotherapeutic agents has a synergistic anti-hepatoma effects.
sentences.chinese: 結論瑞香狼毒可增強細胞毒化療藥物抗肝癌活性。

sentences.english: Antigen density on the tumor cell surface influences the cytotoxic sensitivity .
sentences.chinese: 瘤細胞表面的抗原密度影響細胞毒的敏感性。

sentences.english: Both helper and cytotoxic T cells are stimulated by platelets.
sentences.chinese: 輔助和細胞毒T細胞均能被血小板激活。

sentences.english: Adriamycin is frequenly used in combination chemotherapy regiments with other cytotoxyc drugs.
sentences.chinese: 阿黴素常與其他細胞毒藥物合用於化療方案。
